EmailTemplate.name: PSA Missing Timecard
EmailTemplate.subject: Missing Timecard Alert For Week Ending {!pse__Missing_Timecard__c.pse__End_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
You do not have any Timecards submitted for the Week Ending {!pse__Missing_Timecard__c.pse__End_Date__c}.
Please log into PSA ASAP and submit a timecard.
*** Make sure the Week Ending Date on the Timecard page is {!pse__Missing_Timecard__c.pse__End_Date__c} ***
